name: Bite the Bullet (itch)
description:
A bullet hell game with one bullet. Ran out of bullets? Catch yourself some, right between the teeth!

WASD to move, mouse to shoot.

Kill bosses to unlock more bosses.
(Unlocking is not show properly, so, after completing tutorial you unlock everything other than the devil boss, you unlock the devil boss by beating every other boss)

How to defeat the boss that hides behind its shadow? Shoot it in the back, use the bouncy bullets to your advantage.

Good luck!

Featuring magnificent art by Karolina Ciężak, check her out: Artstation

As you may notice, some things are not finished - that's game jams for ya!
We'll probably post a post-jam version soon.
